name: Focus Association for Sustainable Development
goal:
Focus Association for Sustainable Development is an independent, non-governmental, non-profit and apolitical association of individuals.
Our work covers the following areas:
- climate change,
- energy,
- mobility,
- degrowth and
- global responsibility and consumption.
interests: Budget, Climate Action, Consumers, Education and training, Energy, Environment, Food Safety, International co-operation and development, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Taxation, Transport, Youth
euInitiatives:
Climate legislation
Energy Union
Vehicles and CO2 standards
Directives related to Tax Justice (CBCR, FTT, AMLD)
Unfair trading practices
EU Budget
